nodes.excerpt: It's time again for a new launch! In version 3 we launched a few nifty features like: real-time edit payment pages, create dynamic payment links, manage your customers and Zapier integration to make managing your business a lot easier!
nodes.title: PayRequest 3.0 - Now with customer management and Zapier integration
nodes.author: Geert Jan Sloos

nodes.excerpt: Peachy is ready to help you collect these payments at no upfront cost to you. We only get paid if you do. While we are limiting access to Peachy at this time, we are prioritizing providers who have past due bills they want to collect now for early onboarding.
nodes.title: Peachy Pay - A win-win for patients and providers
nodes.author: PJ Santoro

nodes.excerpt: Startup Falcon is a valuation calculator tool for early stage startups. Are you an entrepreneur? - Get quick, easy, reliable valuations. - Be prepared for negotiations with investors. - Reveal your strengths, tackle your weaknesses.
nodes.title: Startup Falcon - Calculate the value of your startup
nodes.author: Eiass Muhanna

nodes.excerpt: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that offers interest-free liquidity against ETH as collateral. Loans are issued in LUSD â€” a USD pegged stablecoin, and need to maintain a minimum collateral ratio of only 110% due to a novel liquidation mechanism.
nodes.title: Liquity Protocol - Interest-free liquidity at your fingertips

nodes.title: Q.Money - Â¡Not another bank! - Manage all your accounts with just one login.

nodes.excerpt: Steady Capital is a web dashboard for retail investors to buy shares of income-generating commercial real estate. Make investments and see financial reports in our dashboard, and get monthly deposits from your investments directly to your bank account.
nodes.title: Steady Capital - Passive income-generating commercial real estate for $100

nodes.title: Aries - Bridging the stock market gap between retail and wall-street

nodes.excerpt: Stike allows you to use your Debit Card, Credit Card or Bank account to instantly send and receive funds with 0 fees using the Bitcoin Lightning network to transmit payments. Users can also send to regular Bitcoin addresses as well.
nodes.title: Strike - Send money instantly, with no fees, anywhere in the world

nodes.excerpt: Join the Stock Rewards Revolution! Get fractional shares of the brands you love as you shop, automatically. No need to "tap to activate". Simply link as many bank accounts as you like and sit back and earn Stock Rewards.

nodes.excerpt: Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
nodes.title: Ennerate - Automated business valuations for 'Main Street' companies
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Invest in Alternative assets like crypto, collectibles, real estate, and more? No more silly spreadsheets to track your Alt investments. Connect your Alt accounts to track your portfolio's performance. Also, discover over 150 new investments on MoneyMade!
nodes.title: MoneyMade - Track all of your alternative investments from one place
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Here's a well curated list of 168 tech and industry providers for Shopify merchants, from all major categories, including SMS Marketing, Customer Service, Analytics, Financial tools, and much, much more. Steal the JPG here or click link for HQ PDF version.
nodes.title: Shopify Technology Landscape - Curated List of over 150 Tools to Grow Your Store

nodes.excerpt: This is an on demand financial services marketplace. You can immediately connect with Finance, Accounting and Investing professionals. If you are a finance/accounting professional, you can connect with clients easily. Product Link: Doughflowclub.com
nodes.title: Dough Flow Club - Financial and accounting services marketplace

nodes.excerpt: Splitsub is a group buying app for online consumer subscriptions in India. Users share more than 25 different types of subscriptions ranging from streaming services to productivity softwares
nodes.title: Splitsub - Group buying app for online subscriptions
